data.name: Solanaceae: After All
data.detailed_description:
NOTICE: This game is currently in development! Our team is very small, so it will still take us some time to finish the project. We do plan on releasing an Early Access version of the game here to collect feedback before the final release. Thanks in advance for your patience!



Solanaceae: After All is a casual gathering/crafting/management game with a major focus on story, character interactions, and watching sexy scenes! It will hopefully be easy to pick up game, where you read lots of fun story, craft some cute objects, and maybe get kinda horny.

Join Battam, a witch exiled by all conventional covens, on his quest to make a brand new type of coven with the help of his partner Sal, and his sibling, Satine.
Explore a colorful world filled with all types of people and try to create a place where any and all rejected witches can join together to create new kinds of magic, and form bonds that will last a lifetime. Learn more about Battam's sibling Satine (and watch them repair their shaky relationship), meet new people that challenge Battam's beliefs, and discover new ways that magic interacts with with the world-- all while fighting back against the overbearing Rowan Coven who is trying to stop any and all progress!





This game contains R-18 scenes, with the option to opt out entirely in the beginning of the game for a strictly PG-13 version, if that is what you prefer.

Planned features are...
--Early Access build to test out features!
--Gather items to brew cool potions and cook yummy food!
--Manage your coven and get to know your coven members!
--Buy building upgrades for your coven!
--Do side quests and make some money!
--~100k+ main story focusing on character development and interaction!
--Lots of good 'ol achievements!
--Sexy scenes that have *LOTS* of art!
--Way more lore about the world than the comics have!

About the Creator
Hi! I'm DCS! I'm a queer comic artist and game dev who is incredibly passionate about these characters and world. I've been working with them for many years now, and I feel like this game is going to be such a good way to enjoy them if you like them already-- or are totally new to them. Don't feel shy in looking up Solanaceae, as you will find many comics and other games to enjoy while you wait for this game to be completed!

About the Team
--DCS (Writing, character art, background art, programing, concepts)
--Grue (Programing)
--M (UI Design)
--Ladi (Coding Assistant)
--CanaryWitch (Logo, art)
--Genga (Music)

More information will be added as we approach Early Access release, and as questions come up about the project. We're looking forward to working with you to make a fun and fruitful game for everyone! Thanks!

data.short_description: Join Battam, a witch exiled by all conventional covens, on his quest to make a brand new type of coven! Explore a colorful world, gather ingredients for potion brewing and cooking, immerse yourself in a long and detailed story, and view sexy scenes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 32 bit
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible Card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is subject to change!

content_descriptors.notes: The main sex scenes are between two, cis male characters. The side sex scenes are between a trans fem character and males, females, non-binaries, etc. Many scenes contain depictions of consensual BDSM play, which include things like being tied up, being talked down to, etc. There are also voyeuristic and exhibitionist elements, as well as sex outdoors or in public spaces.
